entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: Madam Pince is introduced as a person who extinguishes lamps and chivvies Harry out of the library. She is described as coming to chivvy Harry out of the library by eight o'clock.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a person who is searching for something in the library. He is described as staggering under the weight of many books and returning to the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: gryffindor common room
entities.description: The Gryffindor common room is introduced as a location where Harry returns with his books. It is described as emptying slowly around Harry.

relationships.description: Harry interacted with Madam Pince when she came to chivvy him out of the library.
Harry returned to the Gryffindor common room with his books.
